availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Jones (Henry County, Kentucky, jailer)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, merchant and jailer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ann Jones. Father of Mary E. Jones, Solomon Jones, Nancy Jane Jones, and Henry Selina Jones. Merchant in Henry County in 1850. Jailer in New Castle, Kentucky, from 1860 to 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 425A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 248.
KYR-0001-004-0317.
